#  PRA Coordinators Team -- Excellence Initiative – Research University 

URL: https://excellence.agh.edu.pl/priority-research-areas/pra-coordinators-team
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:24:42

Skip to content

Skip to footer

 PRA Coordinators Team 

(PRA 1) Sustainable energy technologies, renewable sources of energy, energy storage, and resource management. Design, production, application, synergy, and process integration

Professor Adam Szurlej

(PRA 2) New technologies for the circular economy: merging business models with ecoinnovations to improve productivity and minimise waste, as well as to create knowledge and use it

Professor Katarzyna Grzesik

(PRA 3) Water-energy-climate: interdisciplinary approach to sustainable development

Professor Ewa Szalińska van Overdijk

(PRA 4) Technical solutions: from fundamental research, through modelling and design, to prototypes. The application of mathematical, information technology, and electronics tools to macro-, micro-, and nanoscale problems

Professor Krzysztof Duda

(PRA 5) Materials, technologies, and processes inspired by nature: biotechnology, bioinspirations in engineering and materials science, biosensors, bioenergetics, biocatalysis, biocomputers, and biocomputation

Professor Zbisław Tabor

(PRA 6) Intelligent information, telecommunication, computer, and control and operation technologies

Professor Maciej Paszyński

(PRA 7) Design, production, and testing of modern materials and the technologies of the future based on a multidisciplinary approach combining materials engineering with chemistry, physics, mathematics, and medicine

Professor Piotra Bała

(PRA 8) Crossing boundaries: experimental high energy physics, extreme states of matter, advanced radiation detection technologies, transdisciplinary research and applications

Professor Piotr Bożek

PRA Coordinators also are:

Professor Barbara Tomaszewska

Professor Marta Radecka

MSt Lidia Krawentek

Stopka
